title: EIL order book touches Rs 11,350 crore
description: Engineers India Ltd has secured new business worth Rs 4,681 crore this fiscal year, raising its order book to a record Rs 11,350 crore. Upstream and infrastructure segments have driven this growth. The company is also focusing on green energy projects and strengthening its international business, particularly from its Abu Dhabi office.
